name: Tower of Deception
description:
Thanks to playing Tower of Deception!

You are a HANDSOME hero who saves the princess.

Eliminate enemies hiding throughout the Devil's Tower and save the princess.

But be careful!  A wicked monster is after you.

-----------------------------------------------------

Controls

W,A,S,D or ↑,↓,←,→ : Move

Space Bar :  Interaction

-----------------------------------------------------

Team

Chung Woon ( Game Designer )

Black Penguin ( Programmer )

A ( Programmer )

Jeong Hoon ( Sprite, Illustration, Spine  - Artist )

Bom ( Character Design, Illustration - Artist )
